description.value:
Some vesk learn to watch their environment and other creatures around them for signs of danger. Vesk with this racial trait select either @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.gZlg2ZKze0erNLmP]{Perception} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.nBrYkGfNBJAHe0xJ]{Sense Motive}. They gain a +3 racial bonus to checks with the chosen skill. Once this choice is made, it cannot be changed.

This replaces fearless.

Edit the modifier in the Modifiers tab to the chosen skill.

modifiers.name: Observant
